text: Dharmaatmudu () is a 1983 Telugu drama film directed by Bairisetty Bhaskara Rao and produced by K. Kesava Rao. The film stars Krishnam Raju and Jayasudha in the lead roles. The film had musical score by Chellapilla Satyam. The film was remade in Tamil as Nallavanuku Nallavan , in Kannada as Jeevana Chakra and in Hindi as Mera Saathi. The Hindi version was directed by K. Raghavendra Rao. ==Cast== *Krishnam Raju *Jayasudha *Gummadi Venkateswara Rao == Soundtrack == == Reception == ==Awards== Nandi Award for Best Actress - Jayasudha ==External links== Category:1983 films Category:Indian films Category:Indian drama films Category:Telugu films remade in other languages Category:Films scored by Chellapilla Satyam Category:1980s Telugu-language films
title: Dharmaatmudu
